Posted By: LeoKula (10/2/2009 8:07:49 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I have a deck completely built around this guy.  
  
Library searching cards such as [Sage Owl](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sage Owl), [Sensei's Divining Top](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sensei's Divining Top), [Diabolic Tutor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diabolic Tutor) (to get the Djinn if you don't have him), a single [Ponder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ponder), and [Fabricate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fabricate) (to get [Sensei's Diving Top](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sensei's Diving Top)). These cards allow you to setup your library to get [Darksteel Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Colossus), [Inkwell Leviathan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inkwell Leviathan), [Sphinx Sovereign](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sphinx Sovereign), and [Devouring Strossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Devouring Strossus) out much earlier than their mana cost allows. I also have [Clone](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Clone) is there as well, and a few [Oona, Queen of the Fae](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oona, Queen of the Fae). Defense is in cards like [Cancel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cancel), [Essence Scatter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Essence Scatter), and [Negate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Negate).  
  
Fun deck to play.
posts.html:
I have a deck completely built around this guy.

Library searching cards such as Sage Owl, Sensei's Divining Top, Diabolic Tutor (to get the Djinn if you don't have him), a single Ponder, and Fabricate (to get Sensei's Diving Top). These cards allow you to setup your library to get Darksteel Colossus, Inkwell Leviathan, Sphinx Sovereign, and Devouring Strossus out much earlier than their mana cost allows. I also have Clone is there as well, and a few Oona, Queen of the Fae. Defense is in cards like Cancel, Essence Scatter, and Negate.

Fun deck to play.

Posted By: Jedijoe (12/20/2009 12:37:31 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
My blue deck's got five kinds of djinn in it and this is my favorite (this and the Illuminatus, of course). Not only is it stylish but the whole "wish-granting" mechanic makes sense.
  
I suppose you could use Mystic Speculation to cycle your top card, or Clockspinning to put wish counters on it.
  
I use Braids, Conjurer Adept to put it in for free on the 5th turn, then spend the 4 mana to play my top card (hopefully a Djinn Illuminatus or a Deep-Sea Kraken).
posts.html:
My blue deck's got five kinds of djinn in it and this is my favorite (this and the Illuminatus, of course). Not only is it stylish but the whole "wish-granting" mechanic makes sense.
I suppose you could use Mystic Speculation to cycle your top card, or Clockspinning to put wish counters on it.
I use Braids, Conjurer Adept to put it in for free on the 5th turn, then spend the 4 mana to play my top card (hopefully a Djinn Illuminatus or a Deep-Sea Kraken).

posts.post_content: Easy way to cut his ability cost in half for my black & blue bruiser deck: bring out two Nightscape Familiars. Done. I can now bring him out for three and activate his ability for two isles =) works great with my sage owls and ponder, and i can bring out my Nightmare for free on turn four, bring out Sanguine Bond on turn five, and at turn 6, equip him with Vampire's Bite and smack you in the face with a 15/12 flying horsie with lifelink (yes, it will be 15/12 because i will make sure Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth is one of my lands, which makes all my lands double as swamps ;D) for DOUBLE DAMAGE (thanks to Sanguine Bond ;D). Hell. Yea.
